name: Topics in History of Medicine
description: This course offers a focused discussion of several aspects of the history of medicine. Various themes are examined in depth year to year so as to familiarize students with different topics and methodological approaches.
department: Inst. for the History & Philosophy of Science & Technology
prerequisites: HPS318H1 and/or HPS319H1, or at least 1.0 FCE of HPS courses at the 200-level or higher, with a focus on the history of science
